freelance.title: Freelance
freelance.intro: Design through to build ranging from 1 page sites to full content management

text.paraone: I am a UI designer, Front-End Developer, husband and father. Located in Nottinghamshire, in the sunny UK. I am extremely passionate about the web and some would say obsessed about the work I do.
text.paratwo: I live with my wonderful wife Emma and my amazing daughter Tilly.
text.parathree: I can't take all the credit though, my wife manages all the boring stuff for me like filling in my tax returns. She also looks after my freelance clients and the content side of the freelance projects including, image editing, content updates plus much more...
